sub_title: Team Lead | Project Manager | Product Group PMO | PWC Portfolio | Master in Project Management | BBA Honours
summary:
To me every day starts at zero and by the end of the day I want us to have achieved something. I believe that the secret of getting things done is to act. 

In the last few years I have lead, managed and supported multiple projects and change processes in numerous multi-disciplinary and global environments. Due to my background in IT and Business, I very much enjoy working on the cutting edge of Business and IT. This means I’m familiar with concepts such as Agile, Lean, Scrum, DevOps and SAFe.

I have a strong results-driven approach and believe that asking (the right) questions is key to finding (the right) answers. I particularly thrive in an environment with enough freedom to be heard so I can make difference. Always smiling, even when things don't go as planned.

treasury_media.title: Wicked Problems: creating value for the future
treasury_media.description:
Honours and excellence have been the Windesheim’s flagships since 2011 and are part of the University’s vision.
In this booklet you can read how a number of alumni have fared after passing their Windesheim Honours Programmes, what choices they have made and what challenges they have taken on and tackled. 
Antonio van der Knijff participated in the Honours Programme in 2015-2016. He did this next to his BBA studies. His personal story can be found on page eight and nine of this booklet.

awards.title: VSBfonds Scholarship Award
awards.description: VSBfonds annually rewards a maximum of 165 students with a scholarship. The scholarship is intended for students who have an excellent academic record, are socially engaged and want to develop further. With a VSBfonds grant, these students can continue their studies or do research abroad after their Bachelor's degree in the Netherlands.

awards.title: Holland Scholarship Award
awards.description:
The Holland Scholarship is a scholarship that has been made available by the Dutch Ministry of Education, Culture and Science together with Dutch universities and colleges. It is intended for students who want to study, do research or do an internship outside the European Economic Area (EEA).

A limited number of Holland Scholarships are available - 32 scholarships for 2017-2018 and students have been selected by the faculties.

certifications.name: Certified Project Management Associate Level D

projects.title: Scrum Master The Dream VR: Global Partner identification
projects.description:
The Dream VR is a digital startup located in Miami and Barcelona. It is the only technology provider in the world that can reproduce 360º content on 300 million Smart TVs and 50 million Apple TVs in 180 countries.
With the ambition to further expand the 360º / VR technology platform on a global scale, Dream VR is constantly looking for more relevant sponsors and partners to work with.
The project aims to further identify target markets, potential sponsors and partners that are a fit with the value proposition of The Dream VR.

Responsibilities:
• Organizing and facilitating all (scrum) meetings, including the release and sprint planning, sprint reviews, retrospectives and stand-ups;
• Due to the 6 different nationalities in the scrum team, it was even more crucial to focus on creating and stimulating good open communication within the team. This way bottlenecks and dependencies could be solved quickly;
• Supporting and coaching the team in making decisions.

profile_positions.description: VertX is a team of inspired Project professionals, the specialist in managing and supporting projects. BWP has both organizational talent and subject-oriented specialists available, and is able to deliver the best professional for any project role. Their experience and project management expertise ensures that BWP is able to deliver on any project or role that is necessary.
profile_positions.title: Utrecht en omgeving, Nederland

profile_positions.description:
Triodos Investment Management is a globally active impact investor, located in Zeist, the Netherlands, and a wholly-owned subsidiary of Triodos Bank.  

Responsibilities: 
• Consulting the organization in the establishment and execution of due diligence (KYC) policies and procedures. e.g. the process of requesting the KYC information, documentation, review and verification of received documentation and analytical risk assessments for (new) clients.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Project Manager CDD (via BWP)

profile_positions.description: This project is focused on the optimization of compliance & data management within Monuta. It entails the execution of a scan, that unveils bottlenecks and solutions.

Agile PMO - INT

profile_positions.description:
Every year a new group of talented and motivated students within Windesheim start with the multidisciplinary Honours Programme. It is an additional block of academics on top of their own Bachelor’s Programme that is designed to broaden and deepen their knowledge. Furthermore,  a great deal of attention is being spent on talent management and personal development. 

Responsibilities:
• Together with the coordinator responsible for the coaching and guidance of students in their personal development, based on methods such as Strengthsfinder 2.0, Ikigai and Appreciative Inquiry;
• Collaborating with and supporting the coordinator in the operational design and implementation of the Honours Programme 2016-2017.

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Netherlands has civilian aid providers: registered volunteers who are trained in CPR and are
able to use an AED. Through the introduction of a special paging system, these people can quickly
be mobilised when a neighbouring resident goes into cardiac arrest.
